body_html: Note this breaks .enumerate_support() methods when the distribution size changes across calls to a compiled function. See e.g. Categorical.enumerate_support(). We can work around this if a fix doesn't make it into release.
body_text: Note this breaks .enumerate_support() methods when the distribution size changes across calls to a compiled function. See e.g. Categorical.enumerate_support(). We can work around this if a fix doesn't make it into release.
body: Note this breaks `.enumerate_support()` methods when the distribution size changes across calls to a compiled function. See e.g. [`Categorical.enumerate_support()`](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/distributions/categorical.py#L125). We can work around this if a fix doesn't make it into release.
